NewsArticle.Title: Abandoned Village not so Abandoned?
NewsArticle.Content: Today I was exploring the village of Muc-Mor. Imagine to my surprise when I stumbled on an actual sentient being. Short, smelly, and rather blunt he kept demanding to know where my women were.. I left hurridly deciding I would rather fight a goblin. -An excerpt from the journal of Eduardo, Mundane extraordinaire.
